meaning_str.bing:
v. 吃饭；碾碎
n. 早（或午、晚）餐；一顿饭；一餐所吃的食物
网络. 膳食；食品；餐点

早（或午、晚）餐；一顿饭；一餐所吃的食物

一餐；一顿饭；早（或午、晚）餐；膳食；饭菜；粗磨粉；谷物粉末；谷物粗粉

1.en: His jaw dropped when he saw how much the meal cost.
1.cn: 看到那顿饭要花这么多钱，他大吃一惊。

2.en: At least once per month take your client out for a fresh juice or light meal after a session.
2.cn: 每月至少一次在课后带你的客户出去喝新鲜果汁或简单晚餐。

3.en: As you know alcohol contains calories and must be counted in your meal plan.
3.cn: 你知道酒精能增加热卡，因此必须计算在您的食谱之内。

0.cn: 她非常喜欢这里的饭菜。

1.en: One meal. That's all I'm asking for. Please?

2.en: Perhaps the two of us might share a meal together.
2.cn: 或许咱俩该一起吃个饭。

3.en: This is the definitive Sichuan meal. A fabulously fiery fondue.
3.cn: 这是一道经典川菜，绝妙的火锅。

4.en: I'm gonna invite her over. We'll have a nice meal and chat.
4.cn: 我要请她过来，我们可以好好吃一顿，然后聊天。

5.en: Have you had a meal with him yet? What if you hate the way he eats?
5.cn: 你跟他吃过饭了吗? 如果你讨厌他的吃相怎么办?

6.en: It's quite a stiff dough because of the rye in there and the whole meal.
6.cn: 现在的面团很硬，因为里面有黑麦和全麦面粉。

7.en: At dinner it struck me that we were sharing a meal with a group of strangers.
7.cn: 晚餐时，我突然觉得我们在和一群陌生人共进晚餐。

8.en: Oh and check it out, I made Marcel's favorite dish, banana cake with meal worms.
8.cn: 我做了马修最喜欢吃的菜，香蕉蛋糕，加了虫虫。

9.en: You relaxed at the end of the meal. You open your belt. You release one or two notches.
9.cn: 你吃完后放松地松了松腰带，放了1个或2个孔。

10.en: You know what? I have half a mind to pack up the beautiful meal I made... Dinner is served!
10.cn: 你知道吗？我郑重告诉你，我打算把我做的美味晚餐装好...晚餐上来啦！

11.en: Last night, I experienced something new, an extraordinary meal from a singularly unexpected source.
11.cn: 昨晚我有个全新的体验，一顿奇妙的菜肴来自令人意想不到的出处!

12.en: Okay. We have some friends coming in for a meal and we don't want you guys to embarrass us and overreact.
12.cn: 是这样的，我们有朋友想来店里用餐，我们不想你们让我们丢人，或反应过激。

13.en: We want to buy a really expensive meal. We don't want to eat pork rolls at a stall, even with apple sauce.
13.cn: 我们就想吃一顿昂贵的大餐，我们不想去小吃摊吃什么猪肉卷，有苹果酱也不要。

14.en: I'm just gonna run and get the badges, and then we will have our meal. We'll be fine once we've eaten. Yeah.
14.cn: 我马上跑去买票，然后我们就能吃上饭了，吃过东西就好多了。

15.en: You sit down on a Thanksgiving dinner. Your mother-in-law has worked very hard and created a fantastic meal.
15.cn: 你坐在感恩节餐桌上，你的岳母很辛苦地做了一桌的美味佳肴。

16.en: I was just wondering what time you want me to serve your favorite home-cooked meal tonight. Maybe around 8:00?
16.cn: 我就是想问问今晚你想几点吃你最爱的家常菜，8点怎么样？

17.en: Oh, lord, we thank you for this meal and all of your bounty. And we pray that you help Sheldon get back on his rocker.
17.cn: 主啊，感谢您赐予我们晚餐，及您所有的恩赐，我们祈求您帮助谢尔顿重新振作。

18.en: Once you've mastered that, I'm going to reveal how bread can be much more than just a loaf. It can be a meal in itself.
18.cn: 一旦你掌握了，我将告诉你，面包不仅仅是面包，面包本身就是一道大餐。

19.en: They've been away for months and have just flown in from Taiwan. I can't think of anyone better to share this special meal.
19.cn: 我们分别了好几个月，刚刚从台湾飞过来，没人比他们更适合与我分享这道菜。
